humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is the invasive ductal carcinoma measuring 1.2 cm in maximum dimension. This falls within the size range for T1 tumors, which are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive tumor measures 1.2 cm in maximum dimension (slide 3F), which falls under T1 classification (T1: Tumor is 2 cm or less in size). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T1.
